alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Ozark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 10:42PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL OZARK AND EASTERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 PM CST... At 1042 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Price Place, or 17 miles north of Bull Shoals, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bryant Creek State Park, Bull Shoals Lake, Gainesville, Theodosia, Pontiac, Sundown, Brixey, Noble, Willhoit, Gentryville, Thornfield, Sycamore, Dora, Rockbridge, Long Run, Isabella, Drury, and Zanoni. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
